required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Retrospective Chart Review of enVista Toric 0.9D Intraocular Lenses
clinical_study.official_title: Retrospective Chart Review of enVista Toric 0.9D Intraocular Lenses

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the performance of the enVista Toric 0.9D vs non-Toric IOLs equivalent in subjects with mild pre-operative corneal astigmatism of less than 1.0D.

detailed_description.textblock:
The performance of the enVista Toric IOLs will be compared with that of enVista non-Toric (spherical) IOL in patients with pre-op corneal astigmatism <1.0D. At least 384 eyes (n= 192 per lens type) from 3-4 Canadian centers will be investigated.
This is a retrospective chart review for preoperative and postoperative data conducted at least 4 weeks after IOL implantation.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean reduction in cylindrical power of the eye
primary_outcome.description: Reduction in the cylindrical power of the eye is defined as the difference between the magnitudes of the preoperative keratometric cylinder and the residual refractive cylinder (referenced to the corneal plane).

study_pop.textblock: The performance of the enVista Toric IOLs will be compared with that of enVista non-Toric (spherical) IOL in patients with pre-op corneal astigmatism <1.0D. At least 384 eyes (n= 192 per lens type) from 3-4 Canadian centers will be investigated.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Males and Females subjects age 18 or older
- Implant of enVista Toric IOL and/or enVista non-Toric (spherical) IOL in at least one eye
- Subjects that require either an enVista 0.9D Toric IOL or an enVista non-toric (spherical) IOL as determined by the Barrett Toric Calculator (https://ascrs.org/tools/barrett-toric-calculator)
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of ocular comorbidities (e.g., dry eyes, retinal pathology, etc.),
- Decreased BCDVA of 20/25 or worse
- Excessive IOL rotation > 10 degrees
